metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32001 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
We issued this CVE pre-maturely, as we have subsequently realized that thisissue points out a problem that there really is no safe measures around orprotections for.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.1
libcurl3-nss - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.1
libcurl4 - 7.88.1-8ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.88.1-8ubuntu2.1').
